doc.name: edit
doc.summary: Opens the script of an object in the development environment.

examples.example: edit the script of the mouseStack
edit the script of this card
edit the script of player "Show Me" at 100,0

description.p: Use the edit command in the development environment to open the LiveCode script editor with the script of the specified object.
The object is any object reference.

Usint the optional at syntax will pass the subsequent items to the editScript handler as a second parameter. By convention the first two parameters should be a line number and a column character offset from the start of the line.
The edit command is equivalent to selecting the object and choosing Object menuObject Script. If the script ed is not open, the edit command opens a window that shows the script.
